ygData.subject: Rant on this weekend
ygData.msgSnippet: Troll SKs are awesome. I spent this weekend in Lavastorm.  What a kewl place. Now I know where to go to get gems for an aspiring jeweler.  While there I made
ygData.messageBody:
Troll SKs are awesome.
I spent this weekend in Lavastorm. What a kewl place.
Now I know where to go to get gems for an aspiring
jeweler. While there I made 11th on Saturday night and
am half way to 12th. I would never have gotten the kills
I did when solo if not for being a troll. Hitpoint
regeneration and skill usage is the only way I made it.
Granted, my fire saves sucked, but I wasn't taking max
damage every time either. Blue conning Drakes took me to
1/4 bubble of health very often. I figured out a system
to lower that damage after 4 such events. Hit it with
Siphon Strngth to get it's attention, lure it into
Najena mouth, Bash, Disease Cloud, Slash. Repeat as
necessary. I was able to cast and recover my Slam before
the spell becaome available again. Fizzles and
interupts made it close sometimes, but usually had just
under 1/2 health and OOM when it died. I was very
tempted to get another blue when like that, but I knew
the system was working and not to get greedy. I wanted
12 so bad last night!
Loot was ok during the daylight hours, but at night
(game time) loot was almost non-existant.
My only real complaint is that someone I grouped with
was a total jerk. He was a DE SK the same level as me.
He shouted looking for a group. No problem. We start to
kill things, he loots everything! When I give him tells,
group say or says I am ignored. I start to to get really
POed by the third kill but we are taking yellows so I
put up with it. I add an SK guild member to the group
and actually have a conversation. While resting up in
the Najena tunnel, he disappears. We start fighting a
fire imp. We both used HT (mine was a bit off due to
lag and only did about 25 points of damage) but is too
late. We both died. I yelled in group say we needed help
at the entranceand the jerk didn't even try to help out
or respond. My guild member and I disbanded and
reformed. No way in hell I am going to share XP with an
a$$ like that.
For those of you on Bertoxxulous do not group with
Antochion. Actually do me a favor and train him with a
few elementals. :)
On a Verant-get-your-act-together note...
I didn't realize it before but I have my guildsay chat
filter turned off. This was not a problem when I was not
in a guild. The last few days I have been wondering why
everything I said in Guildsay was ignored. It really
wasn't, but now I can't turn the filter back on. It is
a bug that is known and being worked on. How can you
screw up the chat filter on/off switch? I know they
revamped guild stuff totally, but come on! Anyone else
have this problem?
The guild is new, and I am the 2nd highest level in it.
I missed everything that was said at the Officers
meeting Saturday night. They switched to says when they
realized what my problem was. I still missed most of it
as the leader said he would fill me in later. :(
All I got was what dues to pay, and what the Ranking was
going to look like.
Ah well.
If you are on Bertoxx, and are in an evil guild we are
looking for people to align with. Give me a /t in
game. :) If you want to join the guild I will group
with you and see what kind of style you have and if it
fits with us. We don't have a webpage yet, but one is
on it's way. :)
Thanks for the Spore Guardian info. I wandered the
Swamp for hours looking for him. Now I can just stand
still and wait for hours. heh. Is the spawn triggered
after talking to the SK next to Kukulk?
Thanks.

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
11th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
